name: Hygiene Audit
description: On-demand project hygiene audit — dead code, naming, orphaned files, dependency cleanup

then.prompt: Perform a project hygiene audit. Read .kiro/checklists/hygiene.md for the review framework. Scan the current workspace for dead code, orphaned files, naming inconsistencies, unused dependencies, and stale documentation. Be specific — name every file and issue. Propose concrete fixes. End with a prioritized action list.
